{"id":348356293,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â years","timestamp":1591163292,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/348356293/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string str) {\n        int len = str.length();\n        double res = 0;\n        bool neg = false;\n        if (len == 0)\n            return 0;\n        int idx = 0;\n        while (str[idx] == ' ') {\n                idx++;\n            }\n        if (str[idx] == '-')\n            neg = true;\n        if (str[idx] == '-' || str[idx] == '+')\n            idx++;\n        while(idx < len) {\n            if (str[idx] < '0' || str[idx] > '9')\n                break;\n            int val = (int)(str[idx] - '0');\n            res = res * 10 + val;\n            cout << idx << endl;\n            ++idx;\n            \n        }\n        if (neg)\n            res = -res;\n        if (res > INT_MAX)\n            return INT_MAX;\n        if (res < INT_MIN)\n            return INT_MIN;\n        return (int)res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false}
